interpretation:
The black square button represents a sense of closure and finality. It suggests the end of a cycle or a conclusion to a situation. However, this ending may not be entirely satisfying or complete. The black square button advises you to tie up loose ends and complete unfinished business. It also serves as a reminder that sometimes closure is necessary, even if it is uncomfortable. 

This card can also indicate a sense of emptiness or absence. It suggests a void that needs to be filled, whether it's an emotional void or a physical one. The black square button invites you to reflect on what you are missing and what needs to be done to fill that gap. 

In a reading, the black square button can also suggest that you may be avoiding closure or that you are not ready to let go of something. It is important to acknowledge the finality of a situation, even if it is difficult. 

Overall, the black square button is a reminder that endings are a natural part of life and that closure is necessary for growth and healing. It encourages you to take action to complete unfinished business and move forward.
